title: type collections
content: Recommendation for a source of cheap type collections?
author: baker st

comments.content:
Great value: [Storm Type Collections](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203092142/http:/www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/font-packages)

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO

Another one: a nice typecollection from Bitstream (750 cuts) with an excellent typemanager: [FontAgent Pro PLUS](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203092142/http:/www.insidersoftware.com/customer/home.php?cat=279). For Mac or Win.

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
Or you can pick up a copy of WordPerfect or CorelDraw. Both come bundled with a ton of Bitstream fonts.

Yeah, but not OTF like the collection I mentiones.

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO

We have a page in the wiki as well:

Font Starter Packs:

[http://typophile.com/node/30047](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203092142/http:/typophile.com/node/30047 "http://typophile.com/node/30047")
bert...I just added that one to the wiki page. Do you have any idea if there's a list of the actual typefaces included?

There is a pdf somewhere on the site with a list.  
Links on last line of main text:

[http://www.insidersoftware.com/FA\_pro\_plus.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203092142/http:/www.insidersoftware.com/FA_pro_plus.php "http://www.insidersoftware.com/FA\_pro\_plus.php")
